contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Tubbergen | image_skyline = 2007-09-23 13.02 Tubbergen, monumentaal pand.JPG | imagesize = 200px | image_caption = Old town hall | image_flag = Flag of Tubbergen.png | flag_size = 120x100px | image_shield = Coat of arms of Tubbergen.svg | shield_size = 120x100px |image_map = LocatieTubbergen.png |mapsize = 250px | latd = 52 | latm = 25 | latNS = N | longd = 06 | longm = 47 | longEW = E | coordinates_display = inline,title | coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[Overijssel]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 147.40 |area_land_km2 = 146.98 |area_water_km2 = 0.42 |population_as_of = 1 January, 2007 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline]. |settlement_type = Municipality |population_total = 20722 |population_density_km2 = 141 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 }} '''Tubbergen''' ['tʏbɛrɣə(n)] ({{pronunciation|Nl-Tubbergen.ogg}}) is a [[municipality]] and a town in the eastern [[Netherlands]]. ==Population centres== * [[Albergen]] * [[Fleringen]] * [[Geesteren, Overijssel|Geesteren]] * [[Haarle]] * [[Harbrinkhoek]] * [[Hezingen]] * [[Langeveen]] * [[Mander]] * [[Manderveen]] * [[Mariaparochie]] * [[Reutum]] * Tubbergen * [[Vasse, Netherlands|Vasse]] ==Religion== Tubbergen can be characterised as the most [[Roman Catholicism|Roman Catholic]] municipality in the Netherlands. Church attendance at regular Sundays is substantial. The municipality has a high birth rate and the lowest divorce rate in the Netherlands. Politically, the Catholic nature of the municipality is expressed by Tubbergen having the largest share of [[Christian Democratic Appeal|CDA]] voters (66,59%) ==2009 crime survey== According to the 2009 survey by the [[Algemeen Dagblad]], Tubbergen has the lowest crime rate of all municipalities in the Netherlands. According to the mayor, this is primarily because there exists a strong sense of community in Tubbergen. ==External links== *{{commons category-inline}} *[http://www.tubbergen.nl Official website] {{Geographic location | Centre = Tubbergen | North = [[Uelsen (Samtgemeinde)|Uelsen]] ([[Germany|DE]]-[[Lower Saxony|NI]]) | East = [[Dinkelland]] | South = [[Borne, Overijssel|Borne]] | Southwest = [[Almelo]] | West = [[Twenterand]] }} {{Overijssel Province}} [[Category:Municipalities of Overijssel]] [[Category:Populated places in Overijssel]] [[Category:Twente]] {{Overijssel-geo-stub}}
